Uses of Class
org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.quartz.JobSchedulerBuilder

  • Packages that use JobSchedulerBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.quartz  

    • Uses of JobSchedulerBuilder in org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.quartz

      Methods in org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.quartz that return JobSchedulerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.updateExistingTrigger()
      Requests an existing trigger (sharing the same key as the new trigger) for this job to be replaced with the new trigger.
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withCronExpression(String cronExpression)
      Sets the cron expression to base the schedule on.
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withJobGroup(String jobGroup)
      Sets the Job group.
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withJobName(String jobName)
      Sets the Job name, must be unique within the group.
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withPriority(int priority)
      Sets the Trigger's priority.
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withRequestRecovery(boolean requestRecovery)
      Instructs the Scheduler whether or not the Job should be re-executed if a recovery or fail-over situation is encountered.
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withStoreDurably(boolean storeDurably)
      Whether or not the Job should remain stored after it is orphaned (no Triggers point to it).
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withTimeZone(TimeZone timeZone)
      Sets the time zone for which the cronExpression of this CronTrigger will be resolved.
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withTrigger(org.quartz.Trigger trigger)
      Sets the Trigger that will be used to schedule the Job.
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withTriggerGroup(String triggerGroup)
      Sets the Trigger group.
      JobSchedulerBuilder JobSchedulerBuilder.withTriggerName(String triggerName)
      Sets the Trigger name, must be unique within the group.
